6 Hetuduka, Mahantaraduka
Hetuduka, Mahantaraduka
26.
60Nahetuṃ nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
61Nahetuṃ naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
27.
62Nahetuṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
63Nahetuṃ nanocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
28.
64Nahetuṃ nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
65Nahetuṃ naacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
29.
66Nahetuṃ nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
67Nahetuṃ nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
30.
68Nahetuṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
69Nahetuṃ nacittavisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu cittavisaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
31.
70Nahetuṃ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
71Nahetuṃ nanocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
32.
72Nahetuṃ nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
73Nahetuṃ nanocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
33.
74Nahetuṃ nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
75Nahetuṃ nanocittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
34.
76Nahetuṃ nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
77Nahetuṃ nanocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
35.
78Nahetuṃ nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
79Nahetuṃ nanocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
36.
80Nahetuṃ nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
81Nahetuṃ nanocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
37.
82Nahetuṃ naajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
83Nahetuṃ nabāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
38.
84Nahetuṃ naupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
85Nahetuṃ nanoupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
39.
86Nahetuṃ naupādinno dhammo hetussa upādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Ārammaṇe nava, anantare samanantare nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, āhāre ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
87Nahetuṃ naanupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, sahajāte nissaye kamme…pe…  magge vippayutte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
